original_text:
You have cut short the days of his youth;
    you have covered him with a mantle of shame.
korean_text: 그의 젊은 날들을 짧게 하시고 그를 수치로 덮으셨나이다 (셀라)

sentences.original_text: You have cut short the days of his youth
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그의 청년의 날을 짧게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: you have covered him with a mantle of shame
